bq_table_schema.name: invoice_and_item_number
bq_table_schema.description: Concatenated invoice and line number associated with the liquor order. This provides a unique identifier for the individual liquor products included in the store order.

bq_table_schema.name: date
bq_table_schema.description: Date of order

bq_table_schema.name: bottles_sold
bq_table_schema.description: The number of bottles of liquor ordered by the store

bq_table_schema.name: sale_dollars
bq_table_schema.description: Total cost of liquor order (number of bottles multiplied by the state bottle retail)

bq_table_schema.name: volume_sold_liters
bq_table_schema.description: Total volume of liquor ordered in liters. (i.e. (Bottle Volume (ml) x Bottles Sold)/1,000)

bq_table_schema.name: volume_sold_gallons
bq_table_schema.description: Total volume of liquor ordered in gallons. (i.e. (Bottle Volume (ml) x Bottles Sold)/3785.411784)

bq_table_schema.name: category
bq_table_schema.description: Category code associated with the liquor

bq_table_schema.name: category_name
bq_table_schema.description: Category of the liquor

bq_table_schema.name: vendor_number
bq_table_schema.description: The vendor number of the company for the brand of liquor

bq_table_schema.name: item_number
bq_table_schema.description: Item number for the individual liquor product

bq_table_schema.name: item_description
bq_table_schema.description: Description of the individual liquor product

bq_table_schema.name: pack
bq_table_schema.description: The number of bottles in a case for the liquor

bq_table_schema.name: bottle_volume_ml
bq_table_schema.description: Volume of each liquor bottle in milliliters

bq_table_schema.name: state_bottle_cost
bq_table_schema.description: The amount that Alcoholic Beverages Division paid for each bottle of liquor

bq_table_schema.name: state_bottle_retail
bq_table_schema.description: The amount the store paid for each bottle of liquor

bq_table_schema.name: store_number
bq_table_schema.description: Unique number assigned to the store who ordered the liquor.

bq_table_schema.name: store_name
bq_table_schema.description: Name of store who ordered the liquor.

bq_table_schema.name: address
bq_table_schema.description: Address of store who ordered the liquor.

bq_table_schema.name: city
bq_table_schema.description: City where the store who ordered the liquor is located

bq_table_schema.name: zip_code
bq_table_schema.description: Zip code where the store who ordered the liquor is located

bq_table_schema.name: store_location
bq_table_schema.description: Location of store who ordered the liquor. The Address, City, State and Zip Code are geocoded to provide geographic coordinates. Accuracy of geocoding is dependent on how well the address is interpreted and the completeness of the reference data used.

bq_table_schema.name: county_number
bq_table_schema.description: Iowa county number for the county where store who ordered the liquor is located

bq_table_schema.name: county
bq_table_schema.description: County where the store who ordered the liquor is located
